plot: A young man rescues his sweetheart from the clutches of a political boss, and also gathers evidence to help the District Attorney implicate the gang in murder.
title: The Night Hawks
plot_es: A young man rescues his sweetheart from the clutches of a political boss, and also gathers evidence to help the District Attorney implicate the gang in murder.
plot_en: A young man rescues his sweetheart from the clutches of a political boss, and also gathers evidence to help the District Attorney implicate the gang in murder.
